sn48.71-82:1: "Bhikkhus, just as the river Ganges slants, slopes, and inclines towards the east, so too a bhikkhu who develops and cultivates the five spiritual faculties slants, slopes, and inclines towards NibbƒÅna.
sn48.71-82:2: Six about slanting to the eastAnd six about slanting to the ocean.These two sixes make up twelve:Thus the subchapter is recited.
